20-007EC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Ethics Commission Regular Meeting of Thursday, February 20, 2020.A motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner Maniquis, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 4 - Kimmy Maniquis, J. P.
